overview:
Morgen Newman joined IdeaPaint in 2007 as VP of International Sales, responsible for establishing distribution in more than 20 countries globally. Since joining IdeaPaint full time in early 2007, he contributed substantially to the business plan, strategy and successful launch of the company in June 2008. He has played a critical role in raising IdeaPaint’s second and third round of financing and continues to be heavily involved in company strategy.

Newman holds a B.S. in Marketing and Entrepreneurship from Babson College. He was named to Inc Magazineâ€™s 30 Under 30 and BusinessWeekâ€™s list of 25, 25 and Under in October, 2009.
